revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The Farriers New Guide : containing First, The Anatomy of a Horse, being an exact and compendious Discription of all his Parts ; with their Actions and Uses : Illust..."
revision.text: Possibly: The Farriers New Guide : containing First, The Anatomy of a Horse, being an exact and compendious Discription of all his Parts ; with their Actions and Uses : Illustrated with Figures curiously engrav'd on Copper-Plates. Secondly, An Account of all the Diseases incident to Horses, with their Signs, Causes, and Methods of Cure ; wherein many Defects in the Farriers Practice, are now carefully supply'd, their Errors expos'd and amended, and the Art greatly improv'd and advance'd, according to the latest Discoveries. The Whole interspers'd with many curious and useful Observations concerning Feeding and Exercise, &c. By W. Gibson. (London : Printed for William Taylor, at the Ship in Pater-Noster-Row., 1720.) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2508190~S1
